elements.name: User is logged in and has a token for auth

steps.name: i am an authorized user with a token

elements.name: User searches for an artist

steps.name: user calls search endpoint for "Nirvana" of type "artist" with 10 and 0
the API call is successful with status code 200
"Nirvana" is found in "artists" response body with an "7dIxU1XgxBIa3KJAWzaFAC"
"artists.items" array has a length of 10 and "artists.offset" begins from 0

name: Validating Search Endpoint

"tracks[2].name" in response body is "Given Up On Me"

name: Validating Track Endpoints
description: Description: Testing out Spotify Web API Track Related Endpoints

elements.name: User is logged in and has a token for auth

steps.name: i am an authorized user with a token

elements.name: GET user current profile information

steps.name: user calls me endpoint
the API call is successful with status code 200
"display_name" in response body is "speedx77"

elements.name: User is logged in and has a token for auth

steps.name: i am an authorized user with a token

elements.name: Get user profile of specific user

steps.name: user calls user profile endpoint for user "4bbflibvj0k3xne6p7cqc6h3d"
the API call is successful with status code 200
"display_name" in response body is "Jean"
"type" in response body is "user"
"uri" in response body is "spotify:user:4bbflibvj0k3xne6p7cqc6h3d"
"id" in response body is "4bbflibvj0k3xne6p7cqc6h3d"
"external_urls.spotify" in response body is "https://open.spotify.com/user/4bbflibvj0k3xne6p7cqc6h3d"

"items" array has a length of 10 and begins from 0

elements.name: Get users followed artists

steps.name: user calls following endpoint with a limit of 10
the API call is successful with status code 200
"items" array has a length of 10
the user calls the following endpoint again with the after param set to the last artist with 10
the API call is successful with status code 200

elements.name: User is logged in and has a token for auth

steps.name: i am an authorized user with a token

elements.name: Follow a playlist and check if user is following the playlist

steps.name: user calls the follow playlist endpoint for "68dJSKcRlsUB4i3acWCXEk"
the API call is successful with status code 200
check if user is following the playlist id: "68dJSKcRlsUB4i3acWCXEk"
the API call is successful with status code 200
the response body returns "[true]"

elements.name: User is logged in and has a token for auth

steps.name: i am an authorized user with a token

elements.name: Follow/Unfollow an Artists or User and check if that user is following them

steps.name: user calls the follow endpoint with method "PUT" item type "user" and a body of "walkingdeavd" "12130614075" "65efe5oef0xnvwobso42pdwes"
the API call is successful with status code 204
the user calls the check following endpoint with item type "user" with ids "walkingdeavd" "12130614075" "65efe5oef0xnvwobso42pdwes"
the API call is successful with status code 200
the response body returns "[true,true,true]"
user calls the follow endpoint with method "DELETE" item type "user" and a body of "walkingdeavd" "12130614075" "65efe5oef0xnvwobso42pdwes"
the API call is successful with status code 204
the user calls the check following endpoint with item type "user" with ids "walkingdeavd" "12130614075" "65efe5oef0xnvwobso42pdwes"
the API call is successful with status code 200
the response body returns "[false,false,false]"

elements.name: User is logged in and has a token for auth

steps.name: i am an authorized user with a token

elements.name: Follow/Unfollow an Artists or User and check if that user is following them

steps.name: user calls the follow endpoint with method "PUT" item type "artist" and a body of "55Aa2cqylxrFIXC767Z865" "0fA0VVWsXO9YnASrzqfmYu" "5f7VJjfbwm532GiveGC0ZK"
the API call is successful with status code 204
the user calls the check following endpoint with item type "artist" with ids "55Aa2cqylxrFIXC767Z865" "0fA0VVWsXO9YnASrzqfmYu" "5f7VJjfbwm532GiveGC0ZK"
the API call is successful with status code 200
the response body returns "[true,true,true]"
user calls the follow endpoint with method "DELETE" item type "artist" and a body of "55Aa2cqylxrFIXC767Z865" "0fA0VVWsXO9YnASrzqfmYu" "5f7VJjfbwm532GiveGC0ZK"
the API call is successful with status code 204
the user calls the check following endpoint with item type "artist" with ids "55Aa2cqylxrFIXC767Z865" "0fA0VVWsXO9YnASrzqfmYu" "5f7VJjfbwm532GiveGC0ZK"
the API call is successful with status code 200
the response body returns "[false,false,false]"
